name: linky
description: Takes a string and returns a string that wraps http links in anchor tags
readme: ## Description Takes a string and returns a string that wraps http links in anchor tags Can also take options to specify some attributes on the anchor tag (only target at the moment) ## Simple example ``` var linky = require('linky') linky('Go to http://www.colingo.com') ``` Returns: ``` Go to http://www.colingo.com ``` ## With options ``` var linky = require('linky') linky('Go to http://www.colingo.com',{target:"_blank"}) ``` Returns: ``` Go to http://www.colingo.com ```
